Instruction: Prepare bowls and equipment: Separate egg yolks from egg whites. Place egg yolks in a heat-safe bowl. Place egg whites in a clean, dry bowl. Place chopped chocolate and butter in a separate heat-safe bowl.

Melt chocolate and butter: Place the bowl with chocolate and butter in a larger bowl filled with simmering water (double boiler method). Stir until melted and smooth. Remove from heat and let cool slightly.
Whisk egg yolks and sugar: In a separate bowl, whisk egg yolks and sugar together until pale and thickened.
Combine chocolate and egg yolks: Gradually whisk the warm chocolate mixture into the egg yolk mixture. Stir until combined.
Whip cream: In a separate bowl, whip heavy whipping cream with salt until soft peaks form.
Fold ingredients: Gently fold whipped cream into the chocolate mixture, followed by vanilla extract.
Chill and serve: Pour the mousse into individual serving dishes or a bowl. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
